title: 3rd sem electives
content: I just completed my 2nd sem and I'd like to know what all are the special topics in 3rd sem BT

comments.body: We had a literature review special topic where you had to research a topic in detail and read lots of papers and do a presentation. Idk what you guys will have, it might change.
what topic did u research on?
On next gen sequencing and covid 19
